card_name: And Paired with a Side of Eyeballs
rules_text: Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 3] Create two 1/1 colorless Eye creature tokens. Scry 2.
